nodes.text: This crew of brigands was active in the galaxy in the years before the Great Hyperspace War. Although the Stygian Caldera was avoided by most, this group figured that it had to have untold riches, and ventured forth only to stumble across the fabled Sith Empire. Although most of the crew was wiped out upon their discovery, one of their number, a Houk named Gloyd, went on to become an officer in the Sith Navy.
